entries.name: new(src, filename = '-', lineno = 1)
entries.desc: Creates a new Ripper::Filter instance, passes parameters src, filename, and lineno to Ripper::Lexer.new

entries.name: column()
entries.desc: The column number of the current token. This value starts from 0. This method is valid only in event handlers.

entries.name: filename()
entries.desc: The file name of the input.

entries.name: lineno()
entries.desc: The line number of the current token. This value starts from 1. This method is valid only in event handlers.

entries.name: parse(init = nil)
entries.desc: Starts the parser. init is a data accumulator and is passed to the next event handler (as of Enumerable#inject).

entries.name: state()
entries.desc: The scanner's state of the current token. This value is the bitwise OR of zero or more of the Ripper::EXPR_* constants.
